description: An AsynchronousRequestBody to used make multiple changes to a table as a single 'transaction'. All changes will either succeed or fail as a unit.

changes.description: List of changes that describes schema and/or row changes to a table.

snapshotRequest.description: An optional parameter used to create a snapshot of the table's state that includes all table changes upto, and includsing changes from the containing transaction.  If the transaction fails for any reason, a snapshot will not be created.
